title: Maple, pecan and cranberry granola
description: Nutty, fruity wholesome goodness is a must for oat lovers. Please feel free to ad lib here, with substitutions such as honey for maple syrup, raisins, apricots or dried apples for the dried cranberries and cashews for the whole almonds.
ingredients: 175g/6oz mixed seeds (like pumpkin, sunflower, sesame or linseeds)
